entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Poplar River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
